title: Revolutionary Aggregation Technique Secures Collaborative Learning Against Malicious Attacks
summary: A novel aggregation approach based on recursive Euclidean distance calculation secures federated learning against malicious attacks while improving the accuracy of the global model.
intro: Are you concerned about the safety of your data in collaborative machine learning? Malicious attacks, such as backdoor poisoning, label-flipping, and membership inference, can sabotage the learning process and compromise the accuracy of the global model. But fear not! A group of researchers have developed a revolutionary aggregation technique based on recursive Euclidean distance calculation that addresses this critical issue!
prompt: an image futuristic image of a group of individuals from different parts of the world collaborating on a project while a wall of fire protects them from malicious attacks.
creator: Charuka Herath, Yogachandran Rahulamathavan, Xiaolan Liu
